properties.name: plugin.mcp.scope
properties.description: 扫描范围类型，可选值：INTERFACE, CUSTOM

properties.name: plugin.mcp.parser.des
properties.description: 功能描述解析器列表。可选值: TOOL, JACKSON, JAVADOC, SWAGGER2, SWAGGER3

properties.name: plugin.mcp.parser.param
properties.description: 参数解析器列表。可选值: TOOL, JACKSON, SPRINGMVC, JAVADOC, SWAGGER2, SWAGGER3
